# init(alternatesRowBackgrounds:)

**Initializer**

Creates an inset list style with optional alternating row backgrounds.

## Declaration

```swift
init(alternatesRowBackgrounds: Bool)
```

## Creating the list style

- **init()**: Creates an inset list style.
